ValidationRule.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-015073
Request from Heidi Shea to make the "Release Name" field on the Product Release Object unique
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
/** ORIGINAL CODE Name = VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.NI_Product_Release__c.Fields.Name, $ObjectType.NI_Product_Release__c.Fields.Name, Name) **/
AND ( ISNEW(), Name = VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.NI_Product_Release__c.Fields.Name, $ObjectType.NI_Product_Release__c.Fields.Name, Name) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is an existing product release record with the same Release Name as this record. The Release Name must be unique across all product release records
